tags: None
review: It was my friends daughter. She had been admitted for sever stomach ache and vomiting continuously. The child was in serious condition and the Doctor used to visit on for a second in a day. For taking CT Scan he took 2 days and the child was crying cz of pain. When informed doctor he says we don't know what it is and we need to find out. Cz of CT scan child got allergy. When called doctor to please check the CT report and diagnose at the earliest so that the pain can be reduced, he says 'I can come only in the morning to check the report'. Then we replied "if this is the case we will move to other hospital". He said 'You Please Do It'. He was Just delaying to increase the fee of the hospital and. People understand the carelessness. The kid was not able to tolerate the pain. We were helpless!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited the clinic on 20th of Oct.  My sister baby is suffering from loose motion. We entered inside and the doctor without checking anything he gave some medicine and told us to go. He simply charged 350 without telling even a single word about the baby condition. The other bad thing is he immediately called the other patient even though  we are inside. I do not recommend this doctor.
